verses.verse: <S%H8104>"Observe<s%> the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib<s%> and <S%H6213>celebrate<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> for in the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H6629>flock<s%> and the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H977>chooses<s%> to <S%H7931>establish<s%> His <S%H8034>name.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2557>leavened<s%> <S%H2557>bread<s%> with it; <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> with it <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread,<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction<s%> (for you <S%H3318>came<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in <S%H2649>haste<s%>), in <S%H4616>order<s%> that you may <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H9132>life<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> when you <S%H3318>came<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

"For <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7603>leaven<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> with you in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1366>territory,<s%> and <S%H3808>none<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> on the <S%H6153>evening<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H3885>remain<s%> <S%H3885>overnight<s%> until <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

"You are not <S%H3201>allowed<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> in <S%H259>any<s%> of your <S%H8179>towns<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you;

but at the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H977>chooses<s%> to <S%H7931>establish<s%> His <S%H8034>name,<s%> you shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening<s%> at <S%H8121>sunset,<s%> <S%H935><s%> at the <S%H4150>time<s%> that you <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H1310>cook<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> [it] in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H977>chooses.<s%> And in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> you are to <S%H6437>return<s%> <S%H1980><s%> to your <S%H168>tents.<s%>

<S%H8337>"Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread,<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be a <S%H6116>solemn<s%> <S%H6116>assembly<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> [on it.]

"You shall <S%H5608>count<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> for yourself; you shall <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H5608>count<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> from the time you <S%H2490>begin<s%> to put the <S%H2770>sickle<s%> to the <S%H7054>standing<s%> <S%H7054>grain.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H6213>celebrate<s%> the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of <S%H7620>Weeks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with a <S%H4530>tribute<s%> of a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offering<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3152>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blesses<s%> you;

and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> you and your <S%H1121>son<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughter<s%> and your <S%H5650>male<s%> and <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H519><s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is in your <S%H8179>town,<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> and the <S%H3490>orphan<s%> and the <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in your <S%H7130>midst,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H977>chooses<s%> to <S%H7931>establish<s%> His <S%H8034>name.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you were a <S%H5650>slave<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and you shall be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>observe<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>celebrate<s%> the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of <S%H5521>Booths<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> after you have <S%H622>gathered<s%> in from your <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor<s%> and your <S%H3342>wine<s%> <S%H3342>vat;<s%>

and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in your <S%H2282>feast,<s%> you and your <S%H1121>son<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughter<s%> and your <S%H5650>male<s%> and <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H519><s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> and the <S%H3490>orphan<s%> and the <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in your <S%H8179>towns.<s%>

<S%H7651>"Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H2287>celebrate<s%> a <S%H2287>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H977>chooses,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8393>produce<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> so that you shall be <S%H389>altogether<s%> <S%H8056>joyful.<s%>

<S%H7969>"Three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2138>males<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H977>chooses,<s%> at the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of <S%H4682>Unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>Bread<s%> and at the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of <S%H7620>Weeks<s%> and at the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of <S%H5521>Booths,<s%> and they shall not <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> empty-handed.

<S%H376>"Every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H4979>give<s%> as he is <S%H3027>able,<s%> according to the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He has <S%H5414>given<s%> you.

"You shall <S%H5414>appoint<s%> for yourself <S%H8199>judges<s%> and <S%H7860>officers<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8179>towns<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you, according to your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H5186>distort<s%> <S%H4941>justice;<s%> you shall not be <S%H5234>partial,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> and you shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe,<s%> for a <S%H7810>bribe<s%> <S%H5786>blinds<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> and <S%H5557>perverts<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>

<S%H6664>"Justice,<s%> [and only] <S%H6664>justice,<s%> you shall <S%H7291>pursue,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you.

"You shall not <S%H5193>plant<s%> for yourself an <S%H842>Asherah<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> kind of <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> for yourself.
<S%H3808>"Neither<s%> shall you <S%H6965>set<s%> up for yourself a [sacred] <S%H4676>pillar<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8130>hates.<s%>
